bibl.title: A Callimachean Case of Lovesickness: Magic, Disease, and Desire in Aetia frr. 67-75 Pf. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction: poisoned apple. - Lovesickness, sickness as love. - Erōs, self and other. - Sympathetic magic. - Binding and writing as doliai technai. - Context and conclusion: on being in love in the hellenistic court.
bibl.seg: RYNEARSON Nicholas, A Callimachean Case of Lovesickness: Magic, Disease, and Desire in Aetia frr. 67-75 Pf. Avec résumé en anglais.

Introduction: poisoned apple. - Lovesickness, sickness as love. - Erōs, self and other. - Sympathetic magic. - Binding and writing as doliai technai. - Context and conclusion: on being in love in the hellenistic court.
